body_html:
@terryKing1992 Thank you. It worked with below changes.

        chief_queue_runner = opt.get_chief_queue_runner()            # Added
        with sv.managed_session(server.target) as sess:
            if is_chief:                                             # Added
                sv.start_queue_runners(sess, [chief_queue_runner])   # Added

But I am trying to train synchronized RNN model and it still has same problem.
https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/recurrent

body:
@terryKing1992 Thank you. It worked with below changes.
```
        chief_queue_runner = opt.get_chief_queue_runner()            # Added
        with sv.managed_session(server.target) as sess:
            if is_chief:                                             # Added
                sv.start_queue_runners(sess, [chief_queue_runner])   # Added

```
But I am trying to train synchronized RNN model and it still has same problem.
https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/recurrent
